info.title: AI Chatbot Assistant API
info.description:
Comprehensive API documentation for AI Chatbot Assistant - a full-featured chat application with intelligent AI responses, advanced file handling, project management, and real-time collaboration.

## Key Features

### üîê Authentication & Security
- **JWT-based Authentication**: Secure access/refresh token system
- **Password Management**: Change password with validation
- **Session Management**: Multi-device support with token refresh

### üí¨ Real-time Messaging
- **WebSocket/Socket.IO**: Instant bidirectional communication
- **Streaming AI Responses**: Server-Sent Events (SSE) for real-time AI text generation
- **Typing Indicators**: Real-time typing status for users and AI
- **Message Pinning**: Pin up to 10 important messages per conversation
- **Multi-tab Sync**: Seamless synchronization across browser tabs and devices

### üîç Advanced Search
- **Semantic Search**: Vector embeddings (pgvector) for intelligent similarity-based search
- **Global Search**: Search across all conversations with best match highlighting
- **Contextual Results**: Get surrounding messages for better context
- **Conversation Search**: Search within specific conversations

### üìÅ File Management
- **Multi-format Upload**: Support for images, videos, PDFs, and documents
- **Cloudinary Integration**: Secure cloud storage with CDN delivery
- **OpenAI File API**: Upload files to OpenAI for AI-assisted processing
- **PDF Text Extraction**: Automatic text extraction from PDF documents
- **Thumbnail Generation**: Auto-generate previews for media files
- **Upload Statistics**: Track storage usage and file counts

### üìÇ Project Organization
- **Project Management**: Organize conversations into projects
- **Drag & Drop**: Reorder conversations within projects
- **Custom Styling**: Color-coded projects with icons
- **Batch Operations**: Move multiple conversations efficiently

### üë§ User Preferences & Profile
- **Customizable Settings**: AI model, context window, response style
- **Theme Support**: Light, dark, or system-based themes
- **Avatar Upload**: Profile pictures with image optimization
- **Bio & Profile**: User information management
- **Redis Caching**: High-performance preference caching

### üìä Smart Features
- **Follow-up Suggestions**: AI-generated contextual follow-up questions
- **Auto-generated Titles**: Smart conversation naming
- **Unread Tracking**: Intelligent notification system
- **Token Usage Tracking**: Monitor AI API usage per conversation
- **Infinite Scroll**: Efficient pagination for large datasets

### üîÑ Real-time Synchronization
- **Cross-device Sync**: Updates propagate instantly to all devices
- **Conversation Management**: Create, update, delete with realtime broadcast
- **Message Status**: Delivery and read status tracking
- **Activity Updates**: Live conversation activity monitoring

## Base URLs
- HTTP API: `http://localhost:3000/api`
- WebSocket: `ws://localhost:3000`

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication. Include the access token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <access-token>
```

For WebSocket connections, provide the token via:
- Auth header: `socket.handshake.headers.authorization = 'Bearer <token>'`
- Query parameter: `ws://localhost:3000?token=<token>`
- Handshake auth: `socket.auth({ token: '<token>' })`
